title: Extra Credit
description: I had a steamy one-night stand with a hunk named Zack.But the next morning, I discovered the That swoony Casanova is a student in my History 414 class.I’m his professor.Now we’re spending the semester pretending it didn’t happen.But neither of us can forget that sweaty night of passion.Making matters worse is Finn, Zack’s dark-haired roommate.He’s covered with delicious tattoos and has a quiet intensity in his gaze.A gaze which he soon turns on me.Then there’s Professor Dominic Karlson, my colleague in the history department.A former football star, he fills out every inch of his three-piece suit with bulging muscle.He’s the crush of every woman at the university…...yet the woman he wants to date is me.I’m juggling men the way I normally juggle classwork.Grading papers while grading the handsome men in my life.Will I be able to choose between them?Or will my college affairs be discovered?EXTRA CREDIT is a romantic love story filled with humor, suspense, and college-related fun. HEA guaranteed!
author: Cassie Cole
